description.narrative: The project development objective is to strengthen the institutional capacity of the regulator and state-owned insurance corporations and increase the coverage of insurance in Bangladesh.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Financial Management, Procurement, and M&E Specialists | Description :By no later than two (2) months after theEffective Date, the Project Implementing Entity shall recruit and thereafter maintain, throughout the period of implementation ofthe Project: one (1) financial management staff, one (1) procurement staff and one (1) monitoring and evaluation staff, all to beplaced within the PIU and with qualifications, experience and terms of reference satisfactory to the Association. | Frequency:CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Implementation Unit | Description :By no later than one (1) month after the Effective Date, the ProjectImplementing Entity shall: (i) establish and thereafter maintain throughout the project implementation period, a ProjectImplementation Unit with a mandate, composition and resources satisfactory to the Association, and with staff in adequate numbersand with qualifications, experience and terms of reference satisfactory to the Association. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Operations Manual | Description :By no later than two (2) months after the Effective Date, the ProjectImplementing Entity shall adopt and thereafter maintain, throughout the Project implementation period, a Project Operations Manualin form and substance satisfactory to the Association. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Steering Committee | Description :By no later than two (2) months after the Effective Date, theRecipient shall establish and thereafter maintain, throughout the period of implementation of the Project, the Project SteeringCommittee (â€œPSCâ€?) with a mandate, composition and resources satisfactory to the Association. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

title.narrative: Corporate governance regulations issued by IDRA are followed by insurance companies
Adoption and Implementation by IDRA of smart risk-based supervision (Percentage, Custom)
Insurance Companies follow Claims Management Methodology issued by IDRA
Direct project beneficiaries who feel that project investments reflected their needs
Insurance companies issue key facts statements to policy holders following new Consumer Protection regulations issued by IDRA
Insurance companies follow off-site monitoring templates issued by IDRA
On-site inspections of insurance companies performed annually by IDRA (Number, Custom)
Number of insurance policy holders (life and non-life) (Number, Custom)
Total number of policy holders at JBC and SBC
Number of people who receive ABIA Diplomas and Cerficates
Life Insurance policies that lapse after one year at JBC
Solvency margin rule for insurance companies issued by IDRA and implemented
Solvency margin rule issued by IDRA is implemented by JBC and SBC
National Social Insurance Scheme (NSIS) Study conducted
